content: for all configurations  The three-phase power iPDUs can be: – Low voltage 4 wire “Delta” – High voltage 5 wire “Wye”  No EPO (emergency power off) switch is used. IBM z16 A02 has a support element task to simulate the EPO function (only used when necessary to do a System Reset Function).  No DC input feature is available. Internal Battery Feature is not available for z16 A02.  The system is air-cooled and has redundant design for the blowers (fans) and power supplies.  No Top Exit Power feature is available because the 19-inch frame is capable of top or bottom exit of power. All line cords are 4.26 meters (14 feet). Combined with the Top Exit I/O Cabling feature, more options are available when you are planning your computer room cabling.  The new PSCN12 structure uses industry standard Ethernet switches (redundant, 1+1). 2.9.1 Power considerations- IBM z16 A02 (factory frame) The IBM Z operates with redundant power infrastructure. The IBM z16 A02 is designed with a power
